etphoneshome.objects

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • etphoneshome.objects.Obstacle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Platform

    public abstract class Obstacle
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent a generic obstacle with a location and a hitbox. Using the get location method returns the location object of the Obstacle. Using the set location method sets the location object of the Obstacle to the provided new location. Using the get hitbox method returns the hitbox object of the Obstacle. Using the set hitbox method lets you set the hitbox object of the Obstacle by either copying a provided hitbox object, or by providing a height and width. Obstacle is primarily used for the Platform object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Hitbox hitbox
      Hitbox object of the Obstacle set to the default location with a default height and width for a Platform object
      private Location location
      Location object of the Obstacle set to a default location

      Constructors

      Constructor to set the location and hitbox to the provided location and hitbox objects
      Obstacle(Obstacle obstacleToCopy)
      Constructor to copy (by value) the location and hitbox from another Obstacle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hitbox getHitbox()
      Returns the hitbox object of the Obstacle
      Location getLocation()
      Returns the location object of the Obstacle
      void setHitbox(Hitbox hitboxToCopy)
      Sets the hitbox of the Obstacle by copying (by value) the location, height and width from the provided hitbox
      void setHitbox(int height, int width)
      Sets the hitbox of the Obstacle to the current location of the Obstacle, but with the specified height and width
      void setLocation(Location newLocation)
      Sets the location of the Obstacle to a new location object
